name: Berean Standard Bible
text: That is, Shavuot, the late spring feast of pilgrimage to Jerusalem; it is also known as the Feast of Harvest (see Exodus 23:16) or the Feast of Weeks (see Exodus 34:22).

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Literally in Asia; Asia was a Roman province in what is now western Turkey.

text: Prisca is a variant of Priscilla; see Acts 18:2.
